CustomField.description: This field is required. It is manually populated when creating an entity involvement. It describes the type guarantee: Joint & Several - the financial institution could be awarded damages and collect from any one, several, or all of the liable parties; Pro Rata - responsibility for payment of facility is proportional among all the guarantors; Assign Specific - payment of a facility is a set specific dollar amount or percentage amount.
CustomField.label: Contingent Type
